findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: As part of the launch process, initially, the transfers are disabled for all users excluding the owner. Once trades are enabled, they will not be able to stop again.

findings.title: CCR - Contract Centralization Risk
findings.description: The contract's functionality and behavior are heavily dependent on external parameters or configurations, posing centralization risks including Single Point of Control, Vulnerability to Attacks, Operational Delays, Trust Dependencies, and Decentralization Erosion.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The Solidity style guide is a set of guidelines for writing clean and consistent Solidity code. Adhering to a style guide can help improve the readability and maintainability of the Solidity code, making it easier for others to understand and work with.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables configured by user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values, leading to potential problems during execution.
